intro.text: I'm Eduard Luta - friend, father, husband & entrepreneur.
I spent +10 years in marketing and a few in the dating industry. I build things at the intersection of AI and meaning â€“ dua.com for Albanians seeking love, MIK Group for businesses seeking growth.
Here I write about what's real: consciousness, code, marketing, and the patterns connecting them all.
No status games. Just thoughts worth sharing and events worth documenting.

meta: Based between Zug and Prishtina. Working in English, Albanian, and German.
